content:
I am a web developer with over 5 years experience. I have a strong foundation in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as back-end technologies including: Node.js, PHP and MySQL. I am proficient in using JavaScript frameworks (including React and Vue) for building modern, scalable web applications. I am also experienced in using version control systems such as Git and in Unix server administration. I have also maintained my current company's infrastructure for several years, mostly comprising of Amazon Web Services.

In addition to my technical qualifications, I am both comfortable and experienced in liaising with clients and customers and have a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Psychology. I am always looking for opportunities to learn and stay up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices in web development and often refer to the Technology Radar for inspiration.

I﻿n my spare time I like to watch films, television shows or partake in gaming sessions with friends, usually over Discord. We often play competitive games, such as League of Legends, or play cooperative games, such as PalWorld. When I'm not playing games, I like to further hone my developer skills by researching the newest technologies. I am currently creating a website using Nextjs, which will be hosted on Vercel and built with Firebase.
